Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“.........”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“.........”

Monologue.Current: “Сегодня полевой экзамен...”
Monologue.Original: “So today’s the SeeD field exam...”

Monologue.Current: “Я в прошлый раз засыпался...{Line} Слишком нервничал.”
Monologue.Original: “I choked last time...{Line} I was way too nervous.”

Monologue.Current: “Ты хотя бы до экзамена дошёл!{Line} А я этот чёртов тест никак написать не могу!”
Monologue.Original: “At least you made it to the field exam!{Line} I can’t even pass my written test yet!”

Monologue.Current: “Это потому что вы не такие умные, как я!”
Monologue.Original: “I guess you’re not as smart as I am.”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, конечно!{Line} Не напомнишь, кого вчера{Line} оставили после уроков?”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, right!{Line} You’re in study hall today, too!”

Monologue.Current: “Не напоминай...{Line} Мы просто неудачники.”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah...so am I...{Line} I guess we all just suck.”

Monologue.Current: “СиДы мы!{Line} Слабаки и Деграданты!”
Monologue.Original: “We’re just a sad bunch...{Line} SaaaaaaaaD...”

Monologue.Current: “И неудачники!”
Monologue.Original: “SaaaaaaaaD...”

Monologue.Current: “Слабаки и деграданты-неудачники,{Line} заливающие своё ничтожество{Line} остывшим кофе...”
Monologue.Original: “Sad people like us, all we do is complain{Line} in the cafeteria... SaaaaaaaaD...”

Monologue.Current: (Они ведь даже не пытаются{Line} что-нибудь изменить...)
Monologue.Original: (Were these guys{Line} complaining all this time...?)

Monologue.Current: (Поговорю...){Line}(...с парнем передо мной.){Line}(...с парнем позади.)
Monologue.Original: (Which one should I talk to...){Line}(...The guy in front of me){Line}(...The guy in the back)

Monologue.Current: Поклонник Трип #1{Line}“О, как же я люблю тебя,{Line} инструктор {Char Quistis}...”{Next}“Моё метущееся сердце не может{Line} провалиться в сладостную дрёму{Line} в час ночной, о красоте твоей вздыхая...”{Next}“А измождённый организм{Line} за разом раз... отрубается{Line} посреди лекции. Искусительница!..”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Oh, how I love thee, Instructor Quistis...”{Next}“I cannot sleep at night{Line} Thinking of your radiating beauty...”{Next}“That is why I am always{Line} falling asleep in class...{Line} Oh...how sinful you are...”

Monologue.Current: Поклонник Трип #1{Line}“Что же мне сделать, чтобы{Line} стать ближе к тебе,{Line} о прекрасная {Char Quistis}...”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“What do I need to do to get closer{Line} To thee, oh lovely Quistis...”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“Возьми себя в руки!”{Next}“Ты никогда не станешь сидом,{Line} если не прекратишь о ней думать!”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Snap out of it...”{Next}“You’ll never be a SeeD, ’cause you’re{Line} always too busy thinking about her.”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“Да?..”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“So,{Line} how’s it going?”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“А?..”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“......Huh?”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“Посмотри на эту тряпку...”{Next}“Когда-то он был лучшим из нас!{Line} А теперь?.. Взгляни на него!{Line} И всё из-за женщины...”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Check out this weenie...”{Next}“This guy used to be the cream of the crop.{Line} Now look at him... All over one woman.”

Monologue.Current: Поклонник Трип #1{Line}“Перебросимся в картишки?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“How ’bout a{Line} quick game of cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Hey, heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} C’mon, let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: Поклонник Трип #1{Line}“Неплохо...{Line} Я требую реванша!”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“You’re good...{Line} Play me again, ok?”

Monologue.Current: Поклонник Трип #1{Line}“Победа! Ты заходи, не стесняйся.{Line} Повторим в любое время.”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Haha, I won!{Line} I’ll play ya anytime!”

Monologue.Current: Поклонник Трип #1{Line}“Ничья...{Line} В следующий раз{Line} посмотрим кто кого!”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“A draw, eh...?{Line} Let’s settle this next time!”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“Карты? Пожалуй, можно.”{Line}Сыграем{Line}В другой раз
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Cards?{Line} Yeah sure, I’ll play.”{Line}Play{Line}Nah

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“А ты здорово играешь!{Line} Но в следующий раз я выиграю!”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Hey, you’re pretty good.{Line} I’ll beat you next time!”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“Хехехе. Как тебе?{Line} Тренируйся, ты мне пока не ровня!”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Huh? Hey, I WON!{Line} Come back when you’re up to my level!”

Monologue.Current: Друга поклонника Трип #1{Line}“Ничья...{Line} Повторим?”
Monologue.Original: Friend of Trepe Groupie #1{Line}“Hmm, a draw...{Line} Let’s settle this next time!”

Monologue.Current: “Yo, d’ya hear about the{Line} field exam?”
Monologue.Original: “Yo, d’ya hear about the{Line} field exam?”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah.{Line} I heard Seifer basically{Line} did what he pleased, again.”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah.{Line} I heard Seifer basically{Line} did what he pleased, again.”

Monologue.Current: “Again?{Line} He never learns...”
Monologue.Original: “Again?{Line} He never learns...”

Monologue.Current: “I heard this time, he completely ignored{Line} all orders and went berserk.”
Monologue.Original: “I heard this time, he completely ignored{Line} all orders and went berserk.”

Monologue.Current: “I see why he never passes the field exam.{Line} He’s well qualified to be a SeeD, though!”
Monologue.Original: “I see why he never passes the field exam.{Line} He’s well qualified to be a SeeD, though!”

Monologue.Current: “You should talk!{Line} You never pass the written test!”
Monologue.Original: “You should talk!{Line} You never pass the written test!”

Monologue.Current: “And look who got cold feet during the{Line} field exam! So why don’t you just shut up!”
Monologue.Original: “And look who got cold feet during the{Line} field exam! So why don’t you just shut up!”

Monologue.Current: “Now, now...{Line} Calm down, easy...”
Monologue.Original: “Now, now...{Line} Calm down, easy...”

Monologue.Current: “I’m better off than Mr. Paper Test Boy{Line} here! Try makin’ it to the field exam,{Line} why don’t ya!”
Monologue.Original: “I’m better off than Mr. Paper Test Boy{Line} here! Try makin’ it to the field exam,{Line} why don’t ya!”

Monologue.Current: “...What was all that{Line} commotion a while back...?”
Monologue.Original: “...What was all that{Line} commotion a while back...?”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah, I know.{Line} Somethin’ about headmaster faction,{Line} Garden Master faction...”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, I know.{Line} Somethin’ about headmaster faction,{Line} Garden Master faction...”

Monologue.Current: “It was pretty weird.{Line} They were huntin’ down the headmaster{Line} for who knows what...”
Monologue.Original: “It was pretty weird.{Line} They were huntin’ down the headmaster{Line} for who knows what...”

Monologue.Current: “What are you talkin’ about?{Line} You were the one runnin’ around screaming,{Line} ‘I support the Garden Master!’”
Monologue.Original: “What are you talkin’ about?{Line} You were the one runnin’ around screaming,{Line} ‘I support the Garden Master!’”

Monologue.Current: “How ’bout you!{Line} You sided with the Garden Master ’cause{Line} you saw that we were gaining in numbers!”
Monologue.Original: “How ’bout you!{Line} You sided with the Garden Master ’cause{Line} you saw that we were gaining in numbers!”

Monologue.Current: “Enough about that.{Line} It’s over, right!?”
Monologue.Original: “Enough about that.{Line} It’s over, right!?”

Monologue.Current: “(Sigh...){Line} I wonder where we’re going...?”
Monologue.Original: “(Sigh...){Line} I wonder where we’re going...?”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah, where are we headed...?”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, where are we headed...?”

Monologue.Current: “Never expected{Line} this to happen...”
Monologue.Original: “Never expected{Line} this to happen...”

Monologue.Current: “First, Garden moves. Then, next thing{Line} you know, it crashes into a station.”
Monologue.Original: “First, Garden moves. Then, next thing{Line} you know, it crashes into a station.”

Monologue.Current: “I don’t care anymore.{Line} Just bring it on.”
Monologue.Original: “I don’t care anymore.{Line} Just bring it on.”

Monologue.Current: “Seriously...{Line} I feel like I’m losing my mind.”
Monologue.Original: “Seriously...{Line} I feel like I’m losing my mind.”

Monologue.Current: “...Come to think of it,{Line} what do we do besides complain here?”
Monologue.Original: “...Come to think of it,{Line} what do we do besides complain here?”

Monologue.Current: “Hmmm... You’re right.{Line} What else do we do...?”
Monologue.Original: “Hmmm... You’re right.{Line} What else do we do...?”

Monologue.Current: “Just goes to show you how{Line} worthless we are...”
Monologue.Original: “Just goes to show you how{Line} worthless we are...”

Monologue.Current: “...We suck.”
Monologue.Original: “...We suck.”

Monologue.Current: “...We’re losers.”
Monologue.Original: “...We’re losers.”

Monologue.Current: “...We are SaaaaaaD.”
Monologue.Original: “...We are SaaaaaaD.”

Monologue.Current: “I must say,{Line} we’re pretty tough.”
Monologue.Original: “I must say,{Line} we’re pretty tough.”

Monologue.Current: “Word...{Line} I thought it was the end for me{Line} when we had that fight with{Line} the other Garden.”
Monologue.Original: “Word...{Line} I thought it was the end for me{Line} when we had that fight with{Line} the other Garden.”

Monologue.Current: “We’ve accomplished quite a feat.{Line} The fighting inside Garden,{Line} the battle with the other Garden...{Line} That wasn’t training. It was the real thing!”
Monologue.Original: “We’ve accomplished quite a feat.{Line} The fighting inside Garden,{Line} the battle with the other Garden...{Line} That wasn’t training. It was the real thing!”

Monologue.Current: “YEAH!{Line} There were lots of casualties from{Line} both sides, but we’re still alive!”
Monologue.Original: “YEAH!{Line} There were lots of casualties from{Line} both sides, but we’re still alive!”

Monologue.Current: “YEAH! YEAH!{Line} We can DO IT!”
Monologue.Original: “YEAH! YEAH!{Line} We can DO IT!”

Monologue.Current: “But...{Line} We still aren’t SeeDs...”
Monologue.Original: “But...{Line} We still aren’t SeeDs...”

Monologue.Current: “...So, we end up complainin’...{Line} SaaaaaaD...”
Monologue.Original: “...So, we end up complainin’...{Line} SaaaaaaD...”

Monologue.Current: “SaaaaaaD...”
Monologue.Original: “SaaaaaaD...”

Monologue.Current: “Sometimes, I actually enjoy complaining...{Line} SaaaaaaD...”
Monologue.Original: “Sometimes, I actually enjoy complaining...{Line} SaaaaaaD...”

Monologue.Current: “SeeD uniform...{Line} I still can’t believe it.”
Monologue.Original: “SeeD uniform...{Line} I still can’t believe it.”

Monologue.Current: “So this is the uniform we’ve been{Line} yearning for?”
Monologue.Original: “So this is the uniform we’ve been{Line} yearning for?”

Monologue.Current: “It sure was long...{Line} I didn’t think it was possible.”
Monologue.Original: “It sure was long...{Line} I didn’t think it was possible.”

Monologue.Current: “{Char Squall},{Line} thanks for always{Line} hearin’ us out.”
Monologue.Original: “{Char Squall},{Line} thanks for always{Line} hearin’ us out.”

Monologue.Current: “We would always talk about{Line} how we wanted to be like you.”
Monologue.Original: “We would always talk about{Line} how we wanted to be like you.”

Monologue.Current: “Now, we’re one step closer.{Line} Although we still have a long ways to go.”
Monologue.Original: “Now, we’re one step closer.{Line} Although we still have a long ways to go.”

Monologue.Current: “Спасибо, {Char Squall}.”
Monologue.Original: “Thank you, {Char Squall}.”
